General.Name: Zhongtong Guomai Communication
General.Description: Zhongtong Guomai Communication Co., Ltd. provides communication engineering construction services to telecommunication operators in China. Its services include communication equipment installation engineering, communication network maintenance, communication pipeline engineering, etc. Zhongtong Guomai Communication Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Changchun, the People's Republic of China.
